verses.name: Hebrews 7:18
verses.text: For there is verily a disannulling of the commandment going before for the weakness and unprofitableness thereof.

verses.name: Hebrews 7:19
verses.text: For the law made nothing perfect, but the bringing in of a better hope did; by the which we draw nigh unto God.

verses.name: Hebrews 7:20
verses.text: And inasmuch as not without an oath he was made priest:

verses.name: Hebrews 7:21
verses.text: (For those priests were made without an oath; but this with an oath by him that said unto him, The Lord sware and will not repent, Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec:)

verses.name: Hebrews 7:22
verses.text: By so much was Jesus made a surety of a better testament.
